resources.string: Ringlore is a free and open-source card viewing application for the Middle-earth Collectible Card Game.
The remastered card images were created by the MeCCG Remaster project and are used with permission. You can find more information about the MeCCG Remaster project here.
For more information about the Middle-earth Collectible Card Game along with the latest rulings, visit the Council of Elrond website.
Middle-earth CCG and Lord of the Rings are trademarks of Middle-earth Enterprises and/or Iron Crown Enterprises. Ringlore is in no way affiliated with Iron Crown Enterprises or the Tolkien Estate.
